name: Harris Effron
tagline: Web Developer: Ruby on Rails, Backbone.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub Page

I am a web developer experienced in Ruby on Rails, Backbone.js, HTML, CSS. I built a website for [beer homebrewers](http://www.better-brewing.com), and have a background in Materials Science and Engineering.

[Check out my resume](https://github.com/effron/effron.github.io/blob/gh-pages/Resume.pdf?raw=true), or see some of my favorite projects below:

####[Better Brewing](http://www.better-brewing.com)
Better Brewing is a place for beer homebrewers to improve their craft by helping them keep track of their recipes, brews, and tasting notes. If you don't want to sign up, you can sign in as:

Username: demo_user
Password: password

[https://github.com/effron/better-brewing](https://github.com/effron/better-brewing)

####Asteroids
Browser playable Asteroids made using HTML Canvas. Use arrow keys to rotate ship, up to thrust, and spacebar to fire. What's your high score?

[https://github.com/effron/JSAsteroids/tree/after-class](https://github.com/effron/JSAsteroids/tree/after-class)

####DOMSnake
Browser playable Snake game made using JQuery.

[https://github.com/effron/DOMSnake](https://github.com/effron/DOMSnake)

#####TronSnake
Spinoff of DOMSnake, two player game. Snakes grow constantly, the first player to crash loses.

[https://github.com/effron/DOMSnake/tree/tronSnake ](https://github.com/effron/DOMSnake/tree/tronSnake )

####Jrnl
A single page journal app created with Backone.js on top of a Ruby on Rails API.
[https://github.com/effron/jrnl/tree/HarryAfterClass](https://github.com/effron/jrnl/tree/HarryAfterClass)

Thanks for checking out my site! I hope you enjoyed my projects!!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
